name: Gravity (itch) (Falcon_Games5)
description:
Gravity is a 2D platformer set in space where the player moves by switching gravity to change which platform they are standing on.

The game is set in space across all the planets with 10 stars to collect in each to earn medals for each level.

Gravity was made as a final year University project involving both artists and coders from different courses.

Created By:

Coders

Paul Constable

Matthew Rose

Artists

Charlie Grace

Ambar Bellas-Crowther
